name: CVE-2020-9327
description: In SQLite 3.31.1, isAuxiliaryVtabOperator allows attackers to trigger a NULL pointer dereference and segmentation fault because of generated column optimizations.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sqlite:sqlite:3.31.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:cloud_backup:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:18.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:19.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:16.04:*:*:*:esm:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_infrastructure_network_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:outside_in_technology:8.5.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:outside_in_technology:8.5.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:hyperion_infrastructure_technology:11.1.2.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:enterprise_manager_ops_center:12.4.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_network_charging_and_control:12.0.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_network_charging_and_control:6.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_network_charging_and_control:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:zfs_storage_appliance_kit:8.8:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:oracle:communications_messaging_server:8.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_workbench:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
